title: Stop fruitfly (picture only)
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture and Colin Webb
brief_description: Picture-only print in fair/good condition. Details the way in which fruitflys can infiltrate between state borders and ruin fruit in victoria. Nicely shot with good footage of white-jacketed inspectors, people dissembarking from an Ansett plane and fruitfly-infested oranges. Also contains a shot of the ‘Frankston Marine Centre’ truck. Nicely illustrated ‘The End’.
